name: Push-Ups
description: An upper body exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Pull-Ups
description: A back and biceps exercise that requires a bar for pulling.

name: Dips
description: A triceps-focused exercise performed on parallel bars or a dip station.

name: Squats
description: A lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise that works the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Plank
description: A core stability exercise that works the abdominals, obliques, and lower back.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic full-body exercise that improves core strength and cardio.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Leg Raises
description: A core exercise that targets the lower abdominals.

name: Pike Push-Ups
description: A push-up variation that targets the shoulders and upper chest.

name: Superman Hold
description: An isometric back extension exercise that targets the lower back and glutes.

name: Wall Sit
description: An isometric lower body exercise that works the quads and glutes.
